front.title: An Architectural Introduction to the Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP)

abstract.t: This document describes the architecture of the Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP), making it easier to read the rest of the LISP specifications and providing a basis for discussion about the details of the LISP protocols. This document is used for introductory purposes, more details can be found in RFC6830, the protocol specification.
